metadata.title: USN-4703-1 -- Mutt vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Mutt incorrectly handled certain email messages. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4703-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  mutt - 1.9.4-3ubuntu0.5 No subscription required
